results.title: Service Bus Explorer Guide for Data Operations - Azure Service Bus
results.description: If you're sending to a topic, the process increments the Active Messages metrics counter on the subscriptions where the message was routed to. Resend a message After peeking or receiving a message, you can resend it. Resending sends a copy of the message to the same entity, while allowing you to update its content and properties. results.title: Add, invite guest external users to your organization - Azure DevOps Services
results.description: This final step adds the user to your organization. The invitation looks similar to the following image. Note If you need to resend the invitation email, go to Users > select the user > Resend invite. The external user is added to the organization to which they were invited and has immediate access. A guest user can add other guest users to the.
